Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to requiring plaintiffs to furnish proof that notice of possible foreclosure was delivered to the defendant
Summary: Requires plaintiffs to furnish official proof of delivery demonstrating that notice of possible foreclosure was delivered to the defendant.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to requiring plaintiffs to furnish proof that notice of possible foreclosure was delivered to the defendant
